content:
The FlexCard Card action type enables you to trigger actions specific to a record item on a FlexCard or the FlexCard itself.

CARD TYPE

DESCRIPTION

REFERENCE

Append Record 
Adds additional data to the end of a record.
Append a Record from an Action on a FlexCard

Reload 
Reloads the FlexCard.
Add a Reload Action to a FlexCard

Remove 
Removes a record from a list of records coming from the FlexCard's datasource.
Add a Remove Card Action to a FlexCard

Select Cards 
Updates an OmniScript based on a user selected card.
Let Users Update an OmniScript by Selecting Records on a FlexCard

Set Values 
Updates the value of a data field.
Add an Action to Update Field Values on a FlexCard

Update Datasource 
Updates the FlexCard's datasource.
Update a Data Source from an Action on a FlexCard
title: FlexCard Card Actions in OmniStudio
